BackstoryDef.title: Requisitioner
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked by [PAWN_possessive] chapter to requisition materials, they weren’t capable or willing to produce themselves. [PAWN_pronoun] was advised to treat outsiders fairly and barter with them for the goods the Brotherhood desired. If they proved to be uncooperative however, [PAWN_pronoun] was allowed to confiscate wares the chapter needed. This made many wastelanders somewhat wary of [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Educator
BackstoryDef.description: The Brotherhood of Steel had a long and proud history and [PAWN_nameDef] was honoured to teach the squires about it. While [PAWN_pronoun] was a strict teacher, [PAWN_pronoun] was still beloved by [PAWN_possessive] pupils and respected by the adult members of [PAWN_possessive] chapter for [PAWN_possessive] extensive knowledge of the past.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Cleanser
BackstoryDef.description: The wasteland was full of Super Mutants, Ghouls and other abominations the Brotherhood sought to purge. [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a team deployed to cleanse the wasteland of the radiated horrors. [PAWN_pronoun] was an expert fighter, never losing [PAWN_possessive] nerve in battle. After years of fighting the vilest creatures the wasteland spat out, [PAWN_nameDef] developed an almost religious zealotry which separated [PAWN_objective] from the more pragmatic members of the Brotherhood.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Cleanser
BackstoryDef.description: The wasteland was full of Super Mutants, Ghouls and other abominations the Brotherhood sought to purge. [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a team deployed to cleanse the wasteland of the radiated horrors. [PAWN_pronoun] was an expert fighter, never losing [PAWN_possessive] nerve in battle. After years of fighting the vilest creatures the wasteland spat out, [PAWN_nameDef] developed an almost religious zealotry which separated [PAWN_objective] from the more pragmatic members of the Brotherhood.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Quartermaster
BackstoryDef.description: The Brotherhood wouldn’t be the Brotherhood without their heavy suits of power armour and laser weapons. [PAWN_nameDef] was a quartermaster for [PAWN_possessive] chapter and fulfilled this duty with great pride. While all soldiers of the BOS were expected to look after their own gear, [PAWN_nameDef] was the person they went to as soon as their equipment’s damages exceeded their own repairing capabilities.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Scribe
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a scribe with the Brotherhood of Steel. [PAWN_pronoun] received advanced education in many fields such as medicine, engineering, biology and the history of the Brotherhood. [PAWN_pronoun] wasn’t much of a fighter, which wasn’t necessary since combat duties were carried out by the military branch of [PAWN_possessive] chapter.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Reclaimer
BackstoryDef.description: The main purpose of the Brotherhood of Steel was the reclaiming of lost technologies from the old world. [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a team of Brotherhood soldiers tasked with reclaiming caches of technology from pre-war buildings. It was an extremely dangerous task, since most structurally intact ruins were infested by ghouls, mutants, raiders and other vermin.

BackstoryDef.title: Patrol Leader
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a patrol leader within the Brotherhood. [PAWN_pronoun] led [PAWN_possessive] team on the long patrols along the perimeters of chapter’s outposts and encampments. Most of the time, they fought against invasive beasts from the wasteland and the occasional raider. While it was indeed a necessary duty, [PAWN_nameDef] longed to be assigned a more proactive task.

BackstoryDef.title: BoS Advisor
BackstoryDef.description: After many years of devoted service in the Brotherhood, [PAWN_nameDef] became part of the inner circle of [PAWN_possessive] chapter. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly became a trusted advisor for the Elder, whose opinion was highly sought after. Many of [PAWN_possessive] brothers and sisters believed, that [PAWN_pronoun] would one day become the new Elder.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Preservationist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was member of the BOS, who adhered to the preservationist ideology. The preservationists were often seen as followers of a more idealistic vision for the Brotherhood of Steel. While they still thought that they’re main goal was to reclaim lost technology, they often tried to help people outside of the Brotherhood too, since they thought of themselves as guardians and protectors of the whole of humanity.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Reactionary
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was member of the BOS, who adhered to the reactionary ideology. The reactionaries were the most inward oriented group within the Brotherhood. They usually didn’t care much about the common wastelanders, as long as they didn’t get in their way. In their mind, the Brotherhood was the only group who should be allowed to possess pre-war military technology. They didn’t shy away from going to war with other groups, if they refused to give up what the Brotherhood desired.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Restorer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was member of the BOS, who adhered to the restorer ideology. The restorers were a rather young ideology within the Brotherhood. They tried to combine elements of both the preservationist and reactionary ideology. Their most distinctive feature was their approach to the politics of the wasteland since they tried to claim dominion over the people of the wasteland. Since they thought of themselves as the only hope for the continued survival of humankind, their goal was to establish a strong presence within their domain to ensure that the common people of the wasteland obeyed their laws.

BackstoryDef.title: Junior Scribe
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] showed signs of above average intelligence while being educated by the Brotherhood’s Scribes. [PAWN_pronoun] was soon recruited into their ranks where [PAWN_pronoun] could put [PAWN_possessive] mental capabilities to good use. [PAWN_pronoun] may not have been the best fighter the Brotherhood had to offer, but that was the knight’s task anyway.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Squire
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a squire within the Brotherhood of Steel. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained and educated by senior members. While the Brotherhood puts an emphasis on military training, all squires receive some formal education, a privilege many inhabitants of the Wastelands did not enjoy.

BackstoryDef.title: Brotherhood Loner
BackstoryDef.description: The strict military lifestyle of the Brotherhood was not for everyone. [PAWN_nameDef] had trouble adapting to the stringent, regulated routine within the organisation. [PAWN_pronoun] longed for freedom, creative activities, and self-actualization.

BackstoryDef.title: Paladin’s Kid
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of an esteemed paladin of the Brotherhood of Steel. [PAWN_pronoun] trained harder than most other squires, as [PAWN_pronoun] wished to surpass the renown of [PAWN_possessive] parent. The constant training and learning combined with a somewhat aloof attitude towards [PAWN_possessive] peers left [PAWN_objective] somewhat isolated.

BackstoryDef.title: Born Wastelander
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]’s parents joined the Brotherhood after [PAWN_pronoun] was born, bringing their child into the group. [PAWN_nameDef] tried [PAWN_possessive] best to get along with the other squires, but never managed to be wholly accepted as one of their own.

BackstoryDef.title: Rebellious Youth
BackstoryDef.description: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] was a well-known troublemaker in the Brotherhood. [PAWN_pronoun] wasn’t devious, just a bit unruly. However, that was enough to ensure [PAWN_pronoun] spent a lot of time cleaning latrines, peeling tatos and other unpleasant tasks [PAWN_pronoun] was sentenced to by the elders.

BackstoryDef.title: Scarred Survivor
BackstoryDef.description: During [PAWN_possessive] time as a squire [PAWN_nameDef] survived an encounter with one of the wasteland’s many dangerous beasts. While this trauma did not diminish [PAWN_possessive] determination, it left several scars on the outside. [PAWN_nameDef] wore them with pride.

BackstoryDef.title: Born Leader
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was always in charge of [PAWN_possessive] clique. [PAWN_possessive] peers looked up to [PAWN_objective] not because of sheer brawn, but because of [PAWN_possessive] wisdom and natural charisma. Many knights and paladins saw these as the qualities of a future elder.

BackstoryDef.title: Aspiring Knight
BackstoryDef.description: Since the day [PAWN_pronoun] could walk, [PAWN_nameDef] wanted to become a Paladin and earn the privilege of wearing one of the Brotherhood’s finest power-armour. However, the road to this goal proved to be long and difficult and so [PAWN_nameDef] trained even harder than the other squires.

BackstoryDef.title: Zealous Aspirant
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] took the scribes lessons about the impurity of the ghoul, the supermutant and the other mutated abominations to heart. Maybe even a bit too much, for soon [PAWN_pronoun] was known as a merciless zealot. [PAWN_nameDef] preferred to fight [PAWN_possessive] battles up close and personal.

BackstoryDef.title: Outsider Recruit
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] once was an ordinary wastelander but happened to meet a group of the Brotherhood which, unlike many others, wasn’t opposed to the recruitment of outsiders. Before long, [PAWN_pronoun] was accepted as an aspirant and trained and studied alongside some of mankind’s finest warriors.

BackstoryDef.title: Youngling Historian
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] always had an interest in the history of mankind, much to the irritation of [PAWN_possessive] teachers, as the Brotherhood had a very pragmatic mentality and preferred to teach their younglings more “useful” things. [PAWN_pronoun] wasn’t satisfied with the knowledge of how things are, but wanted to know how they came to be, not only in regard of the Brotherhoods own history. The rise and eventual fall of humanity was what fascinated [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_pronoun] often procured this knowledge through unconventional means.

BackstoryDef.title: Canteen Apprentice
BackstoryDef.description: While the Brotherhood usually shunned luxuries, the elders did acknowledge the boost of morale a fine, or at least not revolting, meal offered. As a squire, [PAWN_nameDef] showed a talent for cooking, especially in the large portions the Brotherhood’s canteens needed to feed its members and regularly helped out the staff in [PAWN_possessive] spare time.
